View Javadoc
1   package org.hibernate.cache.infinispan.util;
2   
3   import org.infinispan.commands.ReplicableCommand;
4   import org.infinispan.commands.module.ModuleCommandInitializer;
5   
6   /**
7    * Command initializer
8    *
9    * @author Galder Zamarre√±o
10   * @since 4.0
11   */
12  public class CacheCommandInitializer implements ModuleCommandInitializer {
13  
14     public EvictAllCommand buildEvictAllCommand(String regionName) {
15        // No need to pass region factory because no information on that object
16        // is sent around the cluster. However, when the command factory builds
17        // and evict all command remotely, it does need to initialize it with
18        // the right region factory so that it can call it back.
19        return new EvictAllCommand(regionName);
20     }
21  
22     @Override
23     public void initializeReplicableCommand(ReplicableCommand c, boolean isRemote) {
24        // No need to initialize...
25     }
26  
27  }
